#rdd.DataFrame. dp: DataFrame spark 
ds = spark.read.csv(path='/Users/dt216661/Documents/MyTutorial/CodeForTutor/data',
#                sep=',',
#                encoding='UTF-8',

               header=True, 
               inferSchema=True)

TV           float64
Radio        float64
Newspaper    float64
Sales        float64
dtype: object

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
new_names = [mapping.get(col,col) for col in ds.columns]
ds.toDF(*new_names).show(4)

%pyspark
my_list = [['a', 1, None], ['b', 2, 3],['c', 3, 4]]
dp = pd.DataFrame(my_list,columns=['A', 'B', 'C'])
ds = spark.createDataFrame(my_list, ['A', 'B', 'C'])

0  a  1  NaN
1  b  2  3.0
2  c  3  4.0

A  B  C
0    male  1  2
1  female  2  3
2  female  3  4

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
# caution: you need to chose specific col
dp.A.replace(['male', 'female'],[1, 0], inplace=True)
dp

%pyspark
#caution: Mixed type replacements are not supported
ds.na.replace(['male','female'],['1','0']).show()

%pyspark
dp['cond'] = dp.apply(lambda c: 1 if ((c.TV>100)&(c.Radio<40)) else 2 if c.Sales> 10 else 3,axis=1)





dp.head(4)

%pyspark
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
ds.withColumn('log_tv',F.log(ds.TV)).show(4)

%pyspark
ds = spark.read.csv(path='/Users/dt216661/Documents/MyTutorial/CodeForTutor/data/Advertising.csv',
                    header=True, 
                    inferSchema=True)
dp = pd.read_csv('/Users/dt216661/Documents/MyTutorial/CodeForTutor/data/Advertising.csv')

leftp = dp[['TV', 'Radio', 'Newspaper']]
rightp = dp[['TV','Sales']]

lefts = ds[['TV', 'Radio', 'Newspaper']]
rights = ds[['TV','Sales']]

%pyspark
leftp = pd.DataFrame({'A': ['A0', 'A1', 'A2', 'A3'],
                    'B': ['B0', 'B1', 'B2', 'B3'],
                    'C': ['C0', 'C1', 'C2', 'C3'],
                    'D': ['D0', 'D1', 'D2', 'D3']},
                    index=[0, 1, 2, 3])
                    
rightp = pd.DataFrame({'A': ['A0', 'A1', 'A6', 'A7'],
                       'F': ['B4', 'B5', 'B6', 'B7'],
                       'G': ['C4', 'C5', 'C6', 'C7'],
                       'H': ['D4', 'D5', 'D6', 'D7']},
                       index=[4, 5, 6, 7])

lefts = spark.createDataFrame(leftp)  
rights = spark.createDataFrame(rightp)
